cis175.clockproject

Interface Clock_Interface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomicClock, Clock, CuckooClock, DigitalClock, GrandfatherClock, MechanicalClock, NaturalClock, QuantumClock, SundialClock, WristClock

    public interface Clock_Interface
    Declares three abstract methods to be implemented by all concrete subclasses. Also defines the enumerated CLOCK_TYPE constants used by the Clock constructor.
    Version:
    1.0 CIS175 Spring 2019
    Author:
    Daniel Williams, Matthew Ambrose

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Clock_Interface.CLOCK_TYPE
      Defines enumerated type used in implementation of concrete objects which are subclasses of Clock.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayTime()
      displays the elapsed time using formatted print statements.
      void reset()
      sets the time to zero.
      void tick()
      increments the tick counter by one.

    • Method Detail

      • displayTime

        void displayTime()
        displays the elapsed time using formatted print statements.

      • reset

        void reset()
        sets the time to zero.

      • tick

        void tick()
        increments the tick counter by one.
